reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater wonderfully soft, cozy, and perfect for cool fall nights, comparing it to wearing a warm soft blanket.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Too good to only have one
items.body: So warm, soft and downright cozy. I live in Pa and it is cold this year. I ordered a second sweater and maybe a third. Goes great with leggings and boots. Ordered deep purple, very pretty. Large is quite roomy but if you like the look this is your sweater. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy and warm
items.body: I have 2 of these sweaters, and love how cozy and soft they are! They are also nice and warm for winter weather. I wear them around the house in the winter, they are bulky so have not worn under a jacket. They wash well and are true to size, but I did order one size up for a very oversized fit. Read more
items.author: TenSgal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Order this. You wont regret it!
items.body: LOVE IT!! Super comfortable and soft. Very attractive. Must order more colors! I'm 5' 5", 140, ordered an XL, fits oversized and perfect! Read more
items.author: HappyCustomer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not slouchy like the photo, but itâ€™s so pretty!
items.body: So, I fell in love with this sweater when I was doing my weekly scrolling through Amazon to favorite things I donâ€™t need. When I first took it out of the package I was surprised on how heavy it was. Honestly, I was not expecting that. Usually, this type of material is thinner. Not this one, which I personally love. I love that itâ€™s heavier bc then I donâ€™t have to layer. Itâ€™s warm. However, with that being said I tried it on and the fit is perfect. In the photo, it looks slightly oversized and slouchy on the model, but itâ€™s not. I ordered my normal size ( large ) and I feel like I need an XL. I plan on ordering another one in white and Iâ€™ll definitely size up. The material is sooooo soft and the neckline doesnâ€™t strangle you. This is not a leggings friendly sweater as it doesnâ€™t cover your bum. On me, the sweater hits my hip bone. Thereâ€™s slits on the side and I feel you can definitely dress this up if need be. Also, the sleeves are a tinge too short for me. So if youâ€™re around my height ( 5â€™8 ) youâ€™ll want to size up for sleeve length. I ordered the brown which is a true chocolate brown. The sweater is so prettyâ€¦ Iâ€™m glad I ordered another sweater I donâ€™t need. ðŸ˜¬ Sorry no photo, itâ€™s in the wash. Read more
items.author: Lisa D

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful colors and super soft
items.body: These sweaters deserve more than 5 stars. They are super soft. Beautiful colors. Sleeve length and over all fit is great !!!!! I have bought almost every color so far and sizing is the same on all. You wonâ€™t regret this purchase. They are a thick material. Very warm. Great sweater for the money. Highly recommend Read more
items.author: Product came in two days. Super fast. Beautifully done. Will be displayed in our house for years to come. Thank you !

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like a Fluffy, Warm Hug
items.body: I wanted a big, super soft, fluffy sweater to wear with leggings or skinny jeans. I absolutely LOVE this sweater. I am very petite and ordered an XL. It is super big, honestly, two of me could fit in it, but that is exactly what I wanted. According to the size information, my normal size in this sweater should have been a medium to fit my bust, but the XL is like being wrapped in a big, fluffy, warm blanket. The material feels almost exactly like a Barefoot Dreams blanket or sweater. Also, the purple color is awesome! So, if you want to be wrapped in a fluffy, warm hug, I recommend this sweater! Read more
items.author: M. James

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Perfect Slouchy Winter Sweater
items.body: This is your sweater if you're looking for a slouchy, cozy, hug-me-in- the-cold-weather, cover-my-butt- in-leggings kinda sweater. I am 5'2" and usually buy a size large in regular sweaters. I bought this in an XL and it's very roomy and covers my butt and hangs at mid thigh in the front. Neck is a bit higher than pictured but I stretched it out a bit to hang more like a cowl neck. If you're a chin-tucker when you're sitting or reading, this is great. Could also tuck knees in under the sweater when it's really cold or the movie is that scary. ðŸ˜†. I bought it in white and it reminds me of a Hostess Snoball. Read more
items.author: Sandy Toes

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Nope another lie from facebook and instagram influencers.
items.body: Ha! Don't fall for it. Its the ugliest sweater I have ever seen. And the material and color no bueno. Returned it extremely fast, didn't want it to even sit in my closet. Read more
items.author: Buyer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Apicot, Dark Coffee, Blue, Black, Light Yellow, Coffee, Light Blue, Khaki, White, Purple, Royal Blue, Dark Blue, Light Pink, Deep Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
